channel.title: Release Notes: Square Payment Form
channel.description: Release notes for Square Payment Form.

item.title: SqPaymentForm is retired
item.description: ## SqPaymentForm The `SqPaymentForm` is retired as of October 31, 2022, with all functionality shut off. All `SqPaymentForm` documentation, including the `SqPaymentForm` technical reference, redirects to the Web Payments SDK documentation. ...

item.title: SqPaymentForm is deprecated
item.description: ## SqPaymentForm The **SqPaymentForm** is deprecated. Please use the [Web Payments SDK](/web-payments/overview) for any new web client payment acceptance integrations.

item.title: Documentation and API updates
item.description:
## SqPaymentForm SDK updates
* [SqPaymentForm.masterpassImageURL.](/api/paymentform#masterpassimageurl) This function is updated to return a Secure Remote Commerce background image URL.

item.title: SqPaymentForm methodsSupported has new functionality
item.description: * **New functionality**: Square Payment Form has updated the [SqPaymentForm.methodsSupported](https://developer.{{SQUARE_DOMAIN}}/docs/api/paymentform#methodssupported) function to provide additional detail when it is reporting that a payme...

item.title: SqPaymentForm has a new function for support of the Masterpass payment button
item.description: * **New functionality**: Square Payment Form has the new [SqPaymentForm.masterpassImageUrl](https://developer.{{SQUARE_DOMAIN}}/docs/api/paymentform#masterpassimageurl) function to support a dynamic way to get the Masterpass button backgrou...

item.title: SqPaymentForm support for Square Gift Card payments
item.description: * **BETA release**: Square Gift Card support in Payments API, Orders API, and Square payment form.

item.title: SqPaymentForm support for Strong Customer Authentication
item.description: * **New functionality**: Square Payment Form &mdash; supports Strong Customer Authentication (SCA), which lets developers verify buyer identity with additional billing contact information or other authentication factors.

item.title: SqPaymentForm supports Masterpass
item.description: * **New functionality**: Square Payment Form supports Masterpass &mdash; Square Payment Form now looks for HTML placeholders associated with Masterpass. If the HTML placeholders exist and Masterpass is enabled, a Masterpass button will dis...

item.title: New Payment Form functionality
item.description: Square Payment Form and Checkout API now accept Apple Pay on the Web payments from customers using the Safari browser. Web Apple Pay is a cleaner way to accept mobile web payments from iPhone users. Consumers are increasingly making purchas...

item.title: SqPaymentForm relaxed postal code requirement
item.description: * **New functionality**: Relaxed postal code requirements in Square Payment Form &mdash; As Square APIs expand outside the United States and Canada, we’ve heard feedback from developers that they’d like to remove the postal code field in th...
